About Me

Let me tell you about myself...

BIO

Journeyman software developer. I have 4 years experience in cyber security. I enjoy keeping up with the latest technologies and want to become a Senior Software Engineer one day. I'm most experienced with Java, then JavaScript and Python; I also know a bit of C and C++. I'm also studying big data, artificial intelligence and machine learning. My hobbies include snowboarding, rock climbing and jiu jitsu. Game of Thrones fan.

US Navy

Petty Office First Class

Trained in networking and cyber security. Used defensive tools such as Wireshark and Splunk to analyze network traffic. Conducted cyber threat intelligence assessments.

Regis University

B.S. Computer Science

ABET accredited. 4.0 GPA through all core Computer Science courses. Projected Graduation date: February 2021.

Regis University

M.S. Data Science

Recently started my Masters degree in Data Science with a specialization in Data Engineering. Projected graduation in 2022.
